hl.seg: defending the thinking of France.

doc.seg: The meeting of commattee was held on Friday in parliment house in the control of Mushahid Hussain Syed in that it was suggested that he send helping things and representatives parties and a parlenani persons to Falaatin.

After the meeting Mushahid Hussain said talking with media representatives that the commettee said welcome the suggest by France in which it was called that Israel stop the war and with this give permission to help in helping works for injured persons in Ghaza.
He named the attacks by Israel on Israel attacks the criminal against humanity and said that all countries should dispraise these attacks of Israel.
Mushahid Hussain said criticizing the second standard of the world that the people whom talk against terrorism but they are quite of Israel at attacks on Falastin.
The chairman of commettee for external matters criticized the slow action of leaders.
He said that the commettee has expressed this hope that the new elected president of America obama will deliver speech to Muslim Ummah due to abolish the clash between America and Muslim Umma.
Mushahid Hussain said that to decrease the clash between Muslim Umma and West there should be emergency undertakes but the old issues of Kashmir and Falastin should be solved.
The external matter prime minister Malik Imad Jan said that the external ministers of Islamic countries are going to Saudi Arabia to attend meeting.
This emergency meeting is called on Israelian attacks on Falastin.He said that it knows about the issue of Falastin and the govt. is connecting other countries for this issue.
minister of state for foreign affairs has said that the issue of Palestine should be resolved in accordance with the resolutions of the United Nations.
two journalists from Arab countries also joined the conference and they told about the latest situation in Palestine.
in Islamabad, students of the International University demonstrated protest against the Israeli attacks on Palestine.
the protesters were holding banners and placards having anti Israel slogans written on it.

hl.seg: abstention from dieting in order to avoid Flu.

doc.seg: This research from the American Scientists have come up after the experiments on rats.
in has been proven from experiments that rats put on diet with less calories had less ability to resist the Flu virus.
research has proven this old myth wrong that its better to fast during fever.
according to the scientists one should eat a lot during fever.

the researchers from the Michigan State University say that the rats on dieting had less power to resist the infection and their chances of dying had increased whereas rats on normal diet had better resistance against the Flu virus.
According to Professor Elizabeth Gardner, people who do dieting will not be effected with flue sooner but also they will take more time to recover from it.
she also said that those people who have taken the flue vaccine should also avoid dieting during few months of winter.

hl.seg: 'first nuclear experiment was done in 1990'

doc.seg: Thomas Reid who has worked in the Lever national laboratory of America as a Weapon designer, has written this book with the help of the Ex director of technical intelligence at Las Elmos national laboratory, Dani Stillman.

this book was titled, 'Nuclear Express: political history of bomb and its proliferation' and both writers have claimed that which ever country first made a nuclear bomb either stole the nuclear secrets of another country or they had the support of another nuclear power.
in an interview with US news, Thomas Reid said that in 1990 during Benazir Bhutto's rule, China experimented Pakistan's first nuclear bomb.
Thomas Reid said that based to many reasons, he has a belief that China had experimented Pakistan's first nuclear bomb.
the reasons include the design of the bomb and some information retrieved during talks with the Chinese scientists.
he further added that this was the reason that in 1998 only in a span of two weeks and three days, Pakistan was able to carry out nuclear experiments as a reply to Indian nuclear experiments.
Thomas Reid reminded that in 1961 Russia suddenly carried out a nuclear experiment and besides possessing the bomb for a long time, it took 17 days for America to carry out nuclear experiment.
He further said that the test of the Atom Bomb which Pakistan conducted on May 28, 1998, was made with extreme care and Pakistani scientists had complete confidence in it.
When Thomas Reeds was questioned that China provided nuclear technology to Pakistan then he said in reply that because India was a common enemy for Pakistan and China.
He said that there is a proof to this too that Doctor Abdul Qadeer Khan used Chinese design and after this the documents which were acquired from Libia also confirms this statement.
On a one more question that doing combined nuclear tests is common then he said that in 1990 America conducted a nuclear test for Britain on open belt in Nevada desert.
He said that we guess that too that Israel was given access to the results of this test.
Thomas Reed was also questioned that Is the Chinese Nuclear spread program is continuing?
On this Thomas Reed said that china has been supplying raw material, instructions and design to nuclear facility in Iran's city Isfahan since 1990.
Other than that china also provided Iran a nuclear enrichment plant.
He said that China has been providing nuclear technology to Iran, Syria, Pakistan, Egypt, Libia and Yemen thorough North Korea.

hl.seg: 2008 The best year for Madonna

doc.seg: This show was organized around Madonna's album 'Hard Candy' and it also included Ukrainian gypsy band and Justin Timberlake's one or two songs.
An old racing car was also showed on the stage.
Celine Dion's show in year 2008 was the second best show from revenue point of view in which two thirty six million dollar's were made.
Canadian show 'Taking Chances' visited twenty four countries where as Madonna visited only seventeen countries which was her first tour in last eight years.
The director of shows of both singers was Jimmy King, who also organized the tour 'Reunion' or 'Spice Girls'.
Madonna has broken her own record in 2006
In 2006 in 'confession concerts' she made one ninety three million dollars.
Polestar has declared Bon Jovi third most successful singer who had made one hundred and seventy million dollars.
Bruce Springsteen has made one hundred and sixty million dollars and he stands fourth, and Police stood fifth by making one hundred and twenty six million dollars.
According to this magazine in year 2008 very few people in North America had attended concerts and musical events and only those people participated who were willing to buy expensive tickets.
In America a ticket is increased by an average of 8 percent by cost yearly, Most expensive ticket was sold of 300 dollars at Madonna's show.
The editor of Pollster Gary Bongioni said in prospect of international financial crisis year 2008 proved to be good.
He predicted 2009 a good year for U2 and Springsteen whose albums are about to release.

hl.seg: Ban on coeducation: Taliban

doc.seg: Local Talibans of Gul Bahadur group have distributed a pamphlet in Miran Shah (Capital of Southern Waziristan) and in other Tehsils in which government and semi government coeducational institutes have been threatened.
Pamphlet included that if coeducation institutes are not closed till 5th of January, action will be taken against them.
Pamphlet said that women are banned to have ID Cards for government aid and for educational purposes and women are prohibited to go to NADRA's Offices in all Tehsils.
The announcement on the ban of women ID Card has been made at the time when almost 200 women have submitted forms in NADRA Offices in Southern Waziristan for Benazir Income Support Program.
According to local people the pamphlet issued by Taliban was announced on the loudspeakers of all the Masjids.
However it was not mentioned in the letter that separate educational institute for woman are banned or not.
According to Pamphlet after this announcement any woman caught in the school for getting education or in NADRA's Office for having ID Card will be punished religiously along with her family.
Moreover Police of District Bannu says on Sunday a landmine exploded on Miram Shah Bannu Road in result of that a traveler died and one is injured.
Injured has been admitted in Civil Hospital.

hl.seg: Target Killing: More dead bodies found.

doc.seg: According to the police, on the morning of Sunday, two dead bodies were found from the areas of the main Mangora, Green square and Sohrab khan square, in which their heads were separated from their bodies.
The deceased were told to be related to Frontier core and the police.

An eye witness said that a letter was also found near the dead bodies in which there was a threat that who ever picks up these dead bodies before 11 in the morning, he is responsible for his own death.
Locals say that the dead bodies were lying the market until 11am but later the security officials picked both the dead bodies and transferred them to the hospital.
There has been a dangerous rise in the target killing during the last few weeks in the main city Mangora and the surrounding areas.
In which local citizens including women and security officials are being killed
according to local sources, more than thirty people have been killed to date in these kind of incidents.
so far no organization has taken responsibility of these killings.

the spokesman of the local Taliban in Swat Muslim Khan told on Saturday that the dead bodies found on Friday included those of his fellows and also included the dead body of the Taliban commander in Deolai, Rafiullah.
Muslim Khan said that Rafiullah was under custody of the security forces for the past one and half month.
he had said that the local taliban send notice before killing any one. On the other hand common citizens are worried about these incidents in Mengora.
according to the local people, a large number of security forces are deployed in Mengora but despite of this the attacks on the citizens are ever increasing.

hl.seg: Musical tribute to Benazir from Bakhtawar.

doc.seg: A rap song (a modern style of music) in Bakhtawar's voice has been posted on youtube as well.
This 5 minutes long song contains pictures and video clips of Benazir.
Eighteen years old Bakhtawar is a student at the Edinburgh University.
He has a great Affection towards Peotry and singing.
said that, after the motivation from mother, he started singing peoms as a hobby
He complemented her mother by words, he said you was Beautiful and intelligent, and your work was there in a good way
He said you was shot dead on 27th december at your fore head, at the age of 54, she left 3 children alone.
the people are alone with out, and you are in the heart beat of every one
Baqthawar Benazir Bhutto has the same position of benazir after 20 years, he was the 2nd Bhutto
she was interested in music from the childhood
said that, before his mother's return to home town, he was interested to meet the Grami Awarded Music Director Repref DD in America, but unabe to meet him.
The Sindi Newspaper has published translation of his poem, but his voice was heard with the help of Youtube for the first time
The people around Benazir bhutto has realized the CD of his songs.
on the other hand, the spokesman of Pakistan Peoples Party, Farhatullah Babar has confirmed that the poetry and voice in the song on Youtube is of Bakhtawar.
he told over the phone from Islamabad that its a tribute by a saddened daughter to her brave mother, and it is also being telecast by the government TV network as well.
Farhatullah Babar has said that his party has not decided yet to distribute the CD's of the song by Bakhtawar.
He said that few years back a fake account of his young Chairman Bilawal Bhutto Zardari was made on Facebook which was closed later on.

hl.seg: Ajmal Qasab is a Pakistani : Information Minister

doc.seg: Federal Minister for Information and broadcasting Sherry Rehman while confirming, through and SMS sent to BBC, the citizenship of Ajmal Qasab just added that further investigation is being carried out.
before this the Advisor to Prime Minister for Interior Rehman Malik had denied his Pakistani citizenship.
he had said that no record for Ajmal was found by the citizen record keeping institute, NADRA.
there is no information on this latest statement that on what basis the Government has changed its stance on Ajmal Qasab's citizenship.
However, according to the foreign office spokesman, Ajmal Qasab's citizenship has been confirmed by the interior ministry.
Prior to this the BBC Urdu service and some other newspapers and few TV channels related Ajmal Qasab to be a resident of Punjab province's small city Okara Fareed Kout.
But government has continuously denied this.
At the moment it is not clear that Ajmal Qasab really belongs to Fareed Kout or some other area.

hl.seg: Rocket firing from Lebanon, retaliatory bombardment.

doc.seg: Israeli army and police officials told that four rockets were fired from Lebanon territory into Israel of which one landed in northern Israeli town Nahrya which caused minor injuries to two civilians.
In response to rockets fired from Lebanon territory, Israeli artillery fired rounds in to Lebanon.
This is not clear if these rockets were fired from Hisbualah or the Palestinian groups active in Lebanon.
Lebanese government said it is investigating who is behind the firing of these rockets.
BBC correspondent views this event as a very dangerous happening to the peace process.
BBC's adviser for Middle Ease Jeremy Boyen is of the view that due to firing of these rockets the risk of a war is evident.
A threat is being expressed for the last few days that what if the current proceedings in Gaza spread to the borders of Israel along with Lebanon in the North.
Here, on night between Wednesday and Thursday, Israel's air force did 7 aerial attacks on the Gaza strip.
According to the Israel army, police stations of Hammas, tunnels, stock of weapons, rocket firing points and weapon workers of Hammas were made targets during these attacks.
Besides the aerial attacks, Israel army and marine artillery men continued bombing on Gaza through out the night.
According to the Palestine sources, a mosque was destroyed in one of the aerial attacks in the city of Gaza.
According to unauthentic sources, tanks of Israel army, which were supported by helicopters, moved towards the area of Khan Yunus.
In the fight going on for the last 12 days,almost 700 Palestinians have died including women and children in a large number.
Although on the other hand 11 men of the Israel army were also killed.
Security forces of Israel has confirmed that high defense official Amoos Gilad is going to Qahir to discuss the conditions of the cease fire.
One delegation of Hammas is also about to leave for Qahir to talk to the ambassadors of Egypt.
With this, the director of Falastin authority abbas Mahmood is also reaching Qahira at Friday.

hl.seg: My heart has been broken, return my kidney.

doc.seg: Doctor Richard Batista told that he donated his kidney to her wife in order to save his life before 8 years ago.
According to the saying of news reporter institute A.F. the wife of Doctor Richard Batista gave the reward of that donation and deceived him and made belongings with another person and get divorce.
Doctor Richard Batista told in an interview to an national news Daily News that the lover of my wife made a hole in my heart and that is still in my heart.
According to the barrister of Doctor Richard Batista that the Doctor is saying the returning of his kidney but infect he wants to return the money of that kidney.
According to his wife saying he will show his saying in the front of a judge after some coming days.

hl.seg: Nine k.g. labister freed.

doc.seg: Jarj The Joint Labister was caught from a sea before two weeks.
The company of sea food purchased it in 100 dolors.
And instantly started using the lobster photos for his publicity.
Although, "PETA" a group working for animal rights demanded to release the lobster. As a result of which it will be released in the Sea.
George was caught in Canada from the sea after which he spent 10 days in the city crab and seafood company tank.
The age of lobster can be told by its weight.
Restaurant's manager Keith Walanty says that their purpose was not to hurt the lobster at all. And to keep him in the tank was to provide entertainment to the customers.

Engrid Newkurk from the animal rights group PETA says that restaurant's decision is worth praise and an example for those who want to keep these precious animals in the tank or want to eat them by boiling them alive.

hl.seg: Girl traced with the help of Mobile.

doc.seg: When officials came to know about Natali Maltrice, firefighters and police force of Athol city of Massachusetts started the action.
Officials located the exact location of the girl with the help of GPS in her mobile.
However with the help of Google Street View she was found in a hotel.
A week earlier Natali's grandmother Rose Maltice took Natali with her from supervision of her legal parents.
The police chief of Athol Timothy Anderson told BBC, she said that now she will never return Natali and then she left the state.
Police Contacted Mrs. Maltice, but when he did not returned Natali despite of promise then police decided to find him with the help of Natali's cell.
Since 2005 it is in the law of America that Mobile companies have to provide location of callers 67 percent of callers at a distance of 100 meters and 95 percent of at 300 meters.

hl.seg: Hamid Karzai on India's tour

doc.seg: It is the 2nd tour of India by Hamid Karzai in last five months.
It is hoped that he will discuss the state of affairs after the terrorists attack on Mumbai while in meeting with Prime Minister Manmohan Singh.
During this tour he wishes to deliver emotions of Afghanistan and her people and express his unanimity with India.
During this tour of Karzai other then extremism bilateral trade will also be discussed.
Bilateral cooperation between the two for countering extremism is also hoped to be discussed.
During his last tour of India President Hamid Karzai said that extremism will not be allowed to hinder the relations of the two countries.
He also said that Both India and Afghanistan are facing the challenge of extremism, ruthless and assassination activities.
Peace and solidarity in both the countries is beneficial for the area and the world as well.
We understand the fact that both countries and the whole world unanimously can eliminate the curse of terrorism.
Ajmal Qasab is now in police custody, and it is being hoped that the police will file a charge sheet against him before January 24th.
Ajmal Qasab does not have any lawyer to defend him.
In a letter written to the Pakistani government, Qasab asked for legal aid.
India has give Pakistan proof of the involvement of Pakistani extremists in the Mumbai attacks.
Pakistan has accepted that Ajmal Qasab is a Pakistani civilian.

According to the police case, Ajmal Qasab and his partner Abu Ismail killed 6 police officers including ATS chief Hemant Karkare, Additional Police Commissioner Ashok Kamte and Encounter specialist Police Inspector Vijay Salaskar, after which they fled with their squad car, which was later recovered near DB Marg, Gurgam Choupati.
During police action, Ismail Khan died and the police captured Ajmal alive.
No lawyer was appointed yet, to follow Ajmal's case.
The lawyer chosen by the government, from the legal aid cell, Dinesh Mota refused to accept the case on moral reasons.
Two lawyers pulled out their names after protests and opposition by the people of a political group.

hl.seg: Constitutional Amendment; Committee to be formed

doc.seg: After addressing a seminar on environment change, he told media representatives that for this sake, the parliamentary meeting will take place in which a committee will be formed.

He said that until now, to complete the 17th amendment, the constitutional amendment bill was presented by the Joint National Movement to the National Assembly, whereas other political parties have also presented their constitutional bills in this regard to the parliament.
He said that the Pakistan Peoples Party has also send all the political parties a rough version of the 17th amendment and the committee would analyze their version.
In answer to a question, he said that the parliament would decide the balance of power between the President and the Prime Minister.
The Prime Minister said that the Parliament has the complete right to take any decision.

In answer to another question, he said that in getting the former President retired General Pervez Musharraf to leave his post, apart from the role of political parties, the former Prime Minister and Chairperson of the Pakistan Peoples Party, Benazir Bhutto also played an important role, by forcing the global brotherhood to remove the uniform of President Pervez Musharraf.
He said that the elected Vice President of America, Joe Biden was a supporter of Pakistan and democracy, and that the president honored him in return for his services with the Pakistani Crescent.

Replying to a question about the Indian governments warning of breaking all ties with Pakistan, after the Mumbai incident, the Prime Minister Yusuf Raza Geelani said that the leaders are under extreme pressure from the public, which is why they issue such statements.

hl.seg: Protest against the removal of journalists

doc.seg: On Tuesday the organization of journalists, RIUJ held protests in front of the Islamabad Press Club of journalists and newspaper workers against media owners and the government about the news channel and newspapers removing many of their employees.

Speaking to the protesters, senior member of Pakistan's biggest journalist organization, Federal Union of Journalists, C.R. Shamsi said that the politicians who used to protest with us till yesterday on the streets, today they have become rulers and are sitting in the parliament. Fearing a certain lobby of the media owners, they are not doing anything for the rights of the journalists.

He said that the newspaper owners who speak of human rights have made their offices punishment houses and beggar camps, where despite earning millions of Rupees per year, the workers are given meager wages and by removing hundreds of them, they are killing them economically.

An example of this is in front of us of the worker of a private TV channel, Channel 5, in Lahore, who committed suicide over not getting his salary for four months. And even today, due to being unfairly removed or not getting salaries for months, many workers are leading very difficult lives.
He said that there should be firm steps taken against the TV and newspaper owners, and the journalists should put a protest camp in front of the parliament to get their rights.
C.R. Shamsi criticized the governor of Punjab, Salman Taseer, saying that employees were removed from his Urdu Newspaper 'Aaj Kal' staff, without prior notice.
Wheras Junah daily, Khabrein daily, Channel 5, Burns Plus TV and Aaj TV have removed dozens of workers.

Speaking to the protestors, the General Secretary of PUFJ said that today, throughout the country, journalist organizations are observing a black day against the removal of journalists and newspaper workers, whereas journalists will go to the parliamentary session wearing black bands on their arms to get back their rights.
According to Mazhar Abbas, in 50% of the Pakistani newspapers and TV channels the workers and journalists were being exploited, where they work without any agreement.

He said that till now, more than 200 journalists and workers have been removed from newspapers and TV channels, while it is being feared that the owners will remove hundreds more in the present year, making an excuse of the present financial crisis.

Mazhar Abbas has said that the journalists' movement will continue unless, the dismissed workers are restored, implementation of the seventh wage board responsible of determining the wages of employees of news papers and release of salaries of TV channels and newspaper employees' blocked since many months.

hl.seg: cabinet of eleven members have taken oath.

doc.seg: new cabinet includes six ministers from anti, ex prime minister Sardar Atiq Ahmed Khan, Muslim conference group, two from Pakistan Peoples Party, two from Peoples Muslim Conference and two from the Mutahida Qaumi Movement.
the eleven members cabinet also includes a female member as well who belongs to the anti Atiq Muslim Conference group.

the ruling coalition has said that an expansion will be made in the cabinet next week, and it is expected that a dozen more ministers will be added to the cabinet. note that earlier this month Sardar Atiq Khan was dismissed from the prime ministry through vote of no confidence and Sardar Yaqoob was elected as the new prime minister.
the departments of these ministers will be announced later on.
during the oath taking ceremony, the workers of Pakistan Peoples Party raised slogans in favor of ex prime minister Benazir Bhutto.

hl.seg: 3.5 million users effected from the virus.

doc.seg: discovered for the first time in October 2008, this virus known by the names like Confecker, Down and Up and Kido.
Microsoft had released a patch to tackle with this virus but despite of that almost 3.5 million computer and memory sticks have been affected with it.
the experts say that the number of effected computers can be a lot more.
to handle this, the users need to use Microsoft's MS08067 patch.
according to Microsoft, this virus which infected millions of computers, locates the services.exe file in windows and then enter gets into its code.
afterwards, this virus turns into a DLL type of file into the System folder of the windows.
it also creates the name of this file as well.
then changes the registry details of the windows.
after getting activated, this virus creates a problem which rises as an http server and changes the restore point of the system.
afterwards, it downloads the files from the maker's website.
according to Microsoft, this virus has infected computers in different countries of the world.
these countries include China, Brazil, Russia, India, America and Britain.

hl.seg: 'The Demand for a Quick Report on Indian Information'

doc.seg: In an interview with the representatives of the media, after a meeting of the Home Ministry, he said that the given by India
information will help in investigation in these regards.
He said that Pakistan was a sovereign nation and about the investigation on the information received from India, no country's
dictation wuld be accepted.
He said that apart from the information received from India, they was gathering other information as well.
The internal advisor said that the executive institutions have taken 124 members of practically non-existent groups into custody, solely on the basis of the fear of a reduction in peace.
And if any evidence is found against them, action will be taken against them, while innocent people will be freed.
In an answer to a question, he said that no arrested person would be handed over to India, and that action would be taken against such individuals according to Pakistani law.
He said that action would be taken against these individuals according to the law of the FIA.

while answering a question he said that the Indian law enforcement agencies have collected information about people involved in Mumbai attacks in 42 days therefore the world community including India will give some time to Pakistan to investigate on these informations.
He reiterated this offer from the government that a joint investigation team be made to investigate the Mumbai attacks.
it should be clear that a 3 membered investigation team led by additional director general FIA which is of Mumbai attacks from India.
investigating on informations provided to Pakistan.

Pakistani High commissioner in India Shahid Malik has met president Asif Ali Zardari in which it was cleared that if any person or group from Pakistan is found involved in Mumbai attacks, he will be dealt in accordance with the national laws and no one will be handed over to India. whereas the Indian leadership is putting pressure on Pakistan to extradite the people involved in the incident to India.

hl.seg: 'Any thing is possible in America'

doc.seg: Mr. Obama will take oath as the 44th president of America on 20th January.
while standing on the stairs of the building built in memory of 16th American president Abraham Lincoln and addressing a musical concert
Mr. Obama said that America is facing the most bitter challenges since many generations and he is hopeful that America will take care of it.
Abraham Lincoln put an end to slavery in America.
And with it Mr Obama said that our country is facing a lot of hardships and it will take some time to get out of them and it will be a tough way out.
But apart from this , I am still hopeful that ideological founder of this nation the will remain alive
Other then Iraq and Afghanistan war, America has also been facing extreme financial crisis
Special arrangements have been made for the oath taking cermony
According to management two million people are attending this gathering
Monday is a national holiday in America because on this day one of the greatest saviour of human rights, Martin Luther King was being assisinated
Martin Luther King was black in race

hl.seg: Tribute to Martin Luther King, Devoted to work

doc.seg: Dr. Martin Luther King was assassinated in 1968.
Barack Obama tributed Dr. King and asked Americans to work with united effort for fulfilling their promises.
In Washington preparations are taking place for the arrangements of unprecedented gathering of people for the new President oath ceremony on Tuesday.
Almost two million people are expected to gather to see this historical President Oath.
Barack Obama has started Monday by visiting a medical center in Northern Washington where he met wounded American soldiers afterwards he went to a shelter for homeless and painted a wall.
Talking to correspondents Barack Obama said: The current crisis we are having and the problems many people are facing,in this situation we can't sit and relax.
He said that Martin Luther King has spent his life in serving people.
Barack Obama said that today when we are remembering him, this is not the day to stay and think. It is the day to act.
He said that Tuesday's ceremony will be held on the same place where thousands of people gathered for Martin Luther King's 'I have a dream' in 1963.
In this speech Martin Luther King said that the day will come when people will not be differentiated on the base of their color.
Mathew Price of BBC says that it is the tragedy of history that the day of Martin Luther is 24 hours earlier then the day when first black President of America will sworn in.
For many in southern states of America the Presidency of Barack Obama, will be the interpretation of Martin Luther King's dream.

hl.seg: Was the Additional Political Agent.

doc.seg: The Additional Political Agent was kidnapped by the unknown masked men on the first ten days from Southern Wazeerastan.
Sources said that the member was kidnapped by the Mulla Nazeer Group's local Taaliban.
On the basis of the local organization on Tuesday at nearly four o'clock in the evening the Additional Political Agent of Wazeerastan Aamir Lateef had reached the Wana Scout Camp by a tribal group.
But they didn't say that who kidnapped the Additional Political Agent.
Therefore local people say that the local Taaliban had kidnapped the Political Agent.
Aamir Lateef was kidnapped at that time when he was going to Tank from Wana Camp.
On the eleventh of January 2009 in the tribal locality of Karkandra seven armed masked men had kidnapped the Additional Political Agent Aamir Lateef along with his driver.
Official members say that the kidnappers first unarmed the security available in the cars and then made the Additional Political Agent to sit in another car and took him away.

According to the Local Organization after the kidnap of the Additional Political Agent security forces blockaded all the check posts of the Southern Wazeerastan and the tribal area and every passerby was checked thoroughly and from about a week the officials had ordered economical restrictions on Wana.

on 8th of December 2008, Assistant political agent of north Wazirastan Asmatullah got kidnapped when he was going from Mir Ali to Bannu to enjoy his Eid vacations. Few days after this two people including Tehsildar Amanullah were killed by unknown maskers in north Wazirastan.

hl.seg: British Hacker wins in court

doc.seg: 42 years British citizen has admitted that he had hacked American Army website.
Gary is suffering from Asperger syndrome. Keep in mind that the patient of Asperger syndrome has insanity of doing similar tasks.
According to his lawyers, it is feared he may attempt suicide if handed over to America .
All government attorneys says that there are very fewer doubts about Gary's health.
Lord Justice Moors and Mr. Justice Simon has said that Gary is permitted to file an application for reconsideration in the British court.
Further they said that Interior Secretary did not consider this issue.
But government's attorneys says that Interior Secretary had used his powers.
Gary has never denied of hacking American Army website.
Gary hacked American Computer Systems in 2001 and 2002 due to which American Government suffered a loss of 8,00,000 dollars.
Gary hacked 97 systems including American Naval and NASA.
However Gary says that they did not hack with wrong intentions, rather they were looking for the information on aliens which they think were kept secret by American Government.
Gary's mother Jenes Sharp said that she is happy of the decision.
Gary's lawyer said it's a good decision.
This case is in the court since 2002 and at last a correct decision.

hl.seg: Kashmir: two Hizb Commanders killed.

doc.seg: Colonel Acharya, spokesman of the northern command of the Indian Army deployed in Jammu, told BBC: on a reliable information, troops from 24 rashtria rifles and Jammu Kashmir police besieged the place in batihaas jungle in tehsil Gandwa of the Doda district where the armed extremists were hiding.
they fired at the army and in retaliation two extremists got killed.

Spokesman said that in the 2 killed extremists is district commander Zahoor-ud-din of prohibited Hizbul Mujahiddins who was active for 12 years in the district and who was expert in gunpowder explosives.
His partner has been identified as Sajjad Hussain who according to Army got connected with extremists from last year.

According to Acharia, operation still continues in mentioned jungle areas because according to them there is more possibility that there are more extremists there. Army says that two rifles are recovered in the first phase of the operation.
Yesterday Provincial Head of police Kuldeep Kumar Khudda while issuing statistics for the year 2008 established that this year was the most peaceful year so far.
It is worth mentioning that there was no violence in the election of assembly held in seven phases in November and December.
More than 1300 candidates participated in this election.
Be it known that Hizbul Mujahiddin is active for the past eighteen years in Jammu-Kashimir.
On 12 July 2000, Hizb for the first time announced one sided cease fire after that there was talk between Government Hind(India) and Hizb Commanders.
Although cease fire ended in just fifteen days.
Afterwards several elite commanders of Hizb-ul-Mujahddins were killed in different operations.

on Thursday, the Pakistan's famous daily The News has said regarding the extremist groups existing in the Pakistani administered Kashmir, that Lashkare Taiba and Hizbul Mujahidin have decided to review the Kashmir policy.
it should be clear that both the organizations had a policy that the Kashmir dispute should be resolved through an armed resistance.

hl.seg: Dera Bugti: Explosion on gas pipe line

doc.seg: According to police officials 18 inches diameter pipeline of Loti Gas Field to Pir Koh has been destroyed by explosion.
This pipeline is directed towards Sui Plant.
Moreover pretending himself as the interpreter of banned organization Baloch Republican Army has accepted the responsibility of the explosion on behalf of his organization on phone.
4th pipeline was exploded in four days.
An 18 inch diameter pipeline was destroyed in Dera Allah Yar on Friday whose mending was continued till Sunday morning.
General Manager of Sui Southern Gas Company Mushtaq Siddiqui told in Quetta that this supply line will be restarted after noon.
This pipeline arrives in Quetta via Sibbi.

There is intense scarcity of gas since 3 days in Quetta, Ziarat and suburb areas where on one one hand snowfall is continued and temperature has dropped below freezing point and on the other hand heater and stoves are not working.
Further in the city of Dera Bugti a motorbike exploded in animal market but according to police no casualties.

hl.seg: Adminstrator for Jamaat Al-Dawa.

doc.seg: The central headquarter of Jamaat Al dawa is in Muridkay almost 25 Kilometers away from Lahore.
the center includes hospital, schools and student hostels.
Law minister for Punjab, Rana Sanaullah has said that the posting of administrator in Jammat al Dawa center is to make sure that the social work being done over there is not affected.

the leader of Jamaat al Dawa Hafiz Saeed's son in law Khalid Waheed has told that for the supervision of the hospitals, schools and other welfare organizations a high government official has been appointed and according to him the number of police troops have also been increased.

the Security counsel of the United Nations have imposed sanctions on Jamaat al Dawa after which the Federal government of Pakistan have stared an operation across the country against Jamaat al Dawa and have put leaders including the leader of the Jamaat Hafiz Saeed in House-Arrest.
Khaqan Babar belongs to the DMG or District Management Group.

Hafiz Khalid Waheed has told that on Sunday the Commissioner of Lahore Khusro Pervez Khan along with police and civil administration came to the Taiba Center and inspected its different parts. Khalid Waheed has disapproved the appointment of the administrator in the center of Jamaat al Dawa and said that due to the actions of the government, the number of patients in the hospitals and children in the schools of the center have already decreased.

I am still in Cairo and hope that tomorrow I will get the permission to go to Ghaza.

hl.seg: four new ministers added to the cabinet, totaling 63.

doc.seg: In four newly apponited federal ministers, two represent Mutahida Qaumi Movement(MQM) and two from Jamiaiat-e-Uliyma Islam Fazal-ur-Rehman group.
President Asif Ali Zardari took the oath from the new ministers.
In oath taking ceremony the Prime Minister Yousuf Raza Gilani, members of federal cabinet were present.
With the addition of four new minister to the cabinet, the number of federal minister, prime minister and advisers have totaled to 63
MQM's representative ministers are Farooq Sattar and Babar Ghori, where as Jamiaiat-e-Uliyma Islam Fazal-ur-Rehman group is represented by ministers namely Azam Suwati and Molana Ata-ur-Rehman .
Till now the ministries have'nt been finalized for these ministers.
Farooq Sattar is the convener of MQM where as Babar Ghori is a senator and his term ends on March 10th
Azam Suwati is an independent candidate and was elected a senator and is one of the richest senator.
Moulana Ata-ur-Rahman is a member of National Assembly and also Moulana Fazal-ur-Rahman's younger brother.
Remember that, four statesmen holding posts in important ministries are not the members of the national assembly.

Note that the cabinet was expanded on 3rd November, 2008 with 22 new ministers and 18 national ministries. So, at that time it was thought that the members of MQM would also be included but due to disagreements on the distribution of the ministries, MQM stayed away.

hl.seg: Bolochistan, Blasted Pipeline

doc.seg: According to police, this is a 18 inch diameter pipeline which connects different wells of Parekoh and meets Suyi gas pipeline. This was blasted my some unidentified men in early morning.
Apart from this, yesterday, well number 3 near Suyi had been totally destroyed by a blast and also a gas pipeline near Dera-allayar was also damaged due to a blast.
Militant organization Baloch republican army's spokeperson, Saryaz Baluch accepted the responsibility of these blast on the behalf of his organization.
As the year 2009 started, the was increase in violent incidents in Baluchistan.
This month, till now, several gas pipelines have been blasted. Also, Attacks on trains and on people belonging to the Punjab region have also increased.

Though the Prime Minister of Baluchistan, Nawab Aslam Rayisani, has expressed concern over such activities and ordered the police to exchange information from intelligence agencies, but,stopping such incidents has not been possible yet.

hl.seg: 819 billion dollars package approved for economic reinstatement

doc.seg: No member of Republican Party has voted for this plan of President Obama.
According to Republican members this plan is too 'expensive' and will not be effective.
In the House this package 244 votes were casted in favor and 188 against.
The plan of economic reinstatement will be presented in Senate next week where ruling Democratic party has little majority.
It is feared that due to the strong opposition from Republican party approval from Senate will not be easy.
After the approval of economic reinstatement plan from the House Barak Obama insisted the members not to hinder political opposition to this important plan.
President said this plan which he is hopeful of becoming a law till next month will help in establishing a favorable atmosphere in which American trade will get better.

According to this plan common people and traders will have relief of 75 billion dollars debt and 500 billion will be allocated for renovation of roads, bridges, 10,000 schools, unemployment allowance and for research of new technology.

Washington's correspondent of BBC has said that Barak Obama had resolved to introduce a new political culture by ignoring the political differences but discussion on this economic package has produce bitterness in the politics.
In the House The members of Republican party declared government's proposed bill as wastage of government finances and said that it will not be helpful in creating new opportunities for employment.
They insisted on the bill proposed by their party in which rebate on taxes is focused more.
They said by their package very less investment will be able to generate more employment opportunities.
They said that in place of construction plans, rebate in taxes can produce instant and more employment opportunities.

hl.seg: ""Attacks were not planned in Pakistan""

doc.seg: Wajid Shams ul Hassan while talking to Indian channel 'NDTV' said that the Pakistani investigations report about Mumbai attacks will be released soon.
More than 170 people were killed in last November's Mumbai attacks.
According to India extremist organization Lashkre Taiba is responsible for the attacks.
India also said that 'state elements' of Pakistan were involved in Mumbai attacks.
The mutual relations of the two countries are affected.
High Commissioner Wajid Shams ul Hassan delivered his first statement about Pakistani investigations which shows, what could be in the investigations report.
Wajid Shams ul Hassan said: As for as the result of investigators, Pakistani soil was not used.
It can be any other place, not also England.
I was worried about these two places(Pakistan and England).

India and International community has pressurized Pakistan to take action against the responsible s of Mumbai attacks. Pakistan says that she has arrested dozens of workers of the groups who are supposed to be involved in Mumbai attacks
Wajid Shams ul Hassan said: We are not trying to hide it.
We believe in taking actions on facts.
Our investigations will be acceptable for the world.
We will try to satisfy India through the results(investigation's).
While defending the delay in the Pakistani investigations he said that the collection, understanding and verification of such a materiel takes time.
High Commissioner Wajid Shams ul Hassan said it took India 5 days to present her dossier.

hl.seg: A black man elected as the republican leader too.

doc.seg: in the sixth round of elections in the Republican party, Michael steel has won who received 91 votes out of 168.

During the election for the position of chairman of the party, Katen Dawsen, candidate opposite to Steel, was given 70 votes. Whereas, former chairman Dunken abdicated from the competition in the second round.
People say that from the five candidates who stood for the position of the chairmanship of the republican party, Michael Steel was considered the most conservative among them.

After his win, Michael Steel said in his speech "We are saying to our friends and enemies together, that come with us but those who will cause problems in this, be prepared to separate from us." Michael Steel is from Maryland where he has also been the Deputy governor.
He got famous in 2006 when he stood for a seat in the senate.
But after loosing in the senate elections he was appointed as the chairman of one political conservative committee of the party.
Now after being selected as the chairman of the party, the efforts of the republican party campaign in the entire country will be under his supervision.
He fought elections for this promise that he will give the party a new cause. And that he will use a new technique to join conservative supporters to the party.

hl.seg: India claims the presence of Lashkar-e-Taiaba and Jaish-e-Mohammad in Jammu

According to the resources, fight continued till the last summary of information and troops of Lashkar-e-Tayyaba and Jaish-e-Mohammad are there. More army has been sent over there to fight them.
During that time, Chief Minister Umer Abdullah, appointed by conflate government, met with Governor and told him about him being selected by his National Conference party.
National Conference's allied party Congress also informed governor about their support for Umer Abdullah.
Umer Abdullah will take oath tomorrow as Chief Minister.
To keep in mind that in recent local elections, National Conference gained 28 seats and made it to the top. Those parties who supported separation, opposed elections and boycotted it.
Congress, who got 17 seats has agreed to make a combined government with National Conference.
Today on the arrival of Umer Abdullah in Sri Nagar, party members greeted him with a warm welcome.

On this occasion Umer Abdullah said he will play his role in patching up the talks between Indian government and separation supporters. Until Indian elections and before the new government could emerge, this will not be possible.

hl.seg: Capitalism Revolution: Death of the German millionare

doc.seg: In the south of German, the place by name Subia, Adolf Miracle has lefted a big business people behind him
But, before some time they german people dont know him
After which the business people found difficulities to raise fund from 30 bank, then only he was in the headlines of the newspaper. which reflects a bad future for the mircale group
The Merkel Group had to suffer financial losses of many millions of Euro after its investment to buy shares of German auto maker Volkswagen.
Then monetary institutions canceled this groups loan amounting 700 million and another 1 billion Euro that it necessarily required and hence Merkel came into extreme pressure.

Some time back the bank agreed to provide Merkel Group an emergency loan but Adolf Merkel who raised from a small industrialist to the position of a strong industrial group whose annual income was approximately 30 billion Euro, could not bare the loss in his investment capability.
Adolf Merkel, after the death of his parents started managing the business and took to modernize it.The business under his supervision became very popular and became more strong.
He named his company Ratiopharm which is today Germany's very large acclaimed and successful pharmaceutical company.

Some time back the commercial value of this company was in between 5 and 6 billion Euro and still was earning a revenue of 8.1 billion Euro annually. After the great success of Ratiopharm, the Merkel Group acquired many big businesses which included building materials maker Hydelberg cement to modified/special car maker Kassbohrer company.
The workforce of Merkel Group is nearly about 100,000 throughout the world and its assets include Ratiopharm which always was the most important business in the portfolio.
Adolf Merkel during his liftime expressed the view may a time that " It has been four generations that we have been in pharmaceutical business.
Now the management of this institution is with my children and I hope this institution will be for few hundred years be managed by and in possession of my family.

After the suicide of Adolf Merkel, the banks have provided approval for temporary loans of 400 million Euro for VEM Group but added the condition that VEM should sell off Ratiopharm to improve the financial situation for a long term sustainability.
After the death of Adolf Marclay the Marclay Group will not remain the same as it was before.

hl.seg: Crime rate of foreigners living in Germany

doc.seg: According to recent statistics the crime rate of foreigners between 2004 to 2007 .22
9 percent has reduced to .21
4 percent.
According to Joachim Herrmann the Interior Minister of Bavaria it is only an apparent positive change.
He said: It must be considered that foreigners having the German citizenship are increasing.
So it must be added in the statistics that though the criminal is a German citizen but his background is foreigner.
Herrmann said that from 2010 his state will keep this fact in mind while collecting the data of criminals.
Other than Bavaria, Hemberg is also working on same pattern.

Senator Christoph Ahlhaus of Interior ministry from CDU said:"" When the scientific research is conducted one can not draw results of his own rather they depend on the data which is calculated after research.

Ahlhaus presented an analysis report of provincial office of crime management prepared in 2006, according to which in the Bergdorf area of Hemberg the percentage of foreigners in the crimes committed there was calculated.
Results indicate that here foreigners
crime rate is less then the crimes committed in the whole province.
On the contrary during 2006 when youth crime rate in Berlin was observed revealed that the youth having the foreign background was .44
7 percent.

Other political parties of Germany like SPD, clean atmospherics party Greens, and leftist party Linkspartei are against the of gathering information whether the background of a German citizen is foreign while collecting the data about crimes.

hl.seg: We want quick evacuation of troops from Gaza: Olmert

doc.seg: Ehud Olmert has stressed that for complete evacuation of the army, a future and permanent ceasefire agreement is inevitable.
Hamas and Israel declared ceasefire on Sunday.

On other side, the leader of Hammas Ismail Hannan has said that Israel has been given victory from God in the Gaza war.
He said that in Gaza war, Israel has not been able to succeed to achieve its purpose.

It was decided in the conference that soon an international aid conference will be held for Gaza.
German chancellor Angela Meerkal also attended the mentioned conference.
At least 1300 Palestinians and including 10 soldiers, a total of 13 Israelis were killed in the war lasting for three weeks between the militants of Hammas and Israel.
On the other side, Palestinian President Mahmood Abbas has insisted on the formation of national government in the areas of Palestine.

hl.seg: A video message for Germany from Al-Qaeda

This man is introducing himself as Abu Talha and speaking in German language.
Arabic sub-titles of this video message are also there.
on the side of the screen is the logo of Al-Qaida and the date written in the video is October 2008.

in this message it is said to the German government that after deploying such a large number of troops in Afghanistan this country is thinking that it will not be attacked, if it's not ingeniousness then what else?
introducing himself as Abu Talha, this man however did not threaten to directly attack Germany.
the number of German troops amongst the Allied NATO forces in Afghanistan is around 3500.
last year the German parliament has approved a bill to send one thousand more troops to Afghanistan.
this is the first message to Germany from Al-Qaida.

having a critical eye on terrorism related issues, the famous expert Mikhail Luders says regarding this message: "the recent suicide attack on the German embassy in Kabul is a proof of the fact that we should take it seriously in any case.
for the past few years Al-Qaida has been issuing video messages on internet and there have been attacks as well after such messages.
The responsibility of suicide bomb attack outside the German Embassy in Kabul has been accepted by the armed organization called Taliban's.
Most of the German magazines were associating these attacks with Al Qaeda.
They are targeting Germany

They are blaming Germany for keeping discriminatory policies not only in Afghanistan but in the Middle East also

In the mean time, the German Government says that the German intelligence agencies already knew about this video before it came into the lime light.
The German department for the elimination of crimes is busy in analyzing this video.

hl.seg: Provincial elections in Iraq.

doc.seg: After 2005 these are the first elections in war stricken country.
For 440 seats in provincial elections there are 14400 candidates.
To keep peace during elections 8 hundred thousand Police and Soldiers have been deployed in Iraq.
The borders of Iraq were sealed one day ago i.e. Friday considering the threat that a bomb attach or terror attack can happen on such an important day
A part from theis Airports were closed and public transport was forbidden.
According to the news, due to disallowed traffic the roads of Iraq have been deserted and Iraqi children can be seen playing football on roads.

The security situation during recent elections will help in analyzing that after American withdrawal in 2011 whether the local security organizations will be able handle the country or not. On the other hand political analysts is watching this as an experiment with which it can assessed that how much Iraqi people are ready to bring change in the country through democratic way.
Provincial elections are being held in Iraq With the help of United Nations and approximate 800 international correspondents will monitor the elections.

hl.seg: Assassination of Baloch traders in Karachi, complete strike in Quetta.

doc.seg: Complete strike was observed in Quetta and some other areas against murder of four Baluchi traders in Karachi.
During this all the trade centers remained close traffic was also less then normal.

The protest was called by Baluchistan trades organization, Pakhtunkhah Milli Awami Party AND JUI who blamed that Karachi Police has allegedly killed them by firing when they reached their car showroom at Tariq Road.
Abdul Rahim Kakar President of Traders Organization has demanded that police officials involved in the incident should be arrested and punished.
However no instant statement of police has arrived.
The killed traders belonged to the city of Chaman.
Government arranged security vastly during strike and police was deployed at all the important places of the city.

hl.seg: Senior Hamas Commander died in Israeli attack

doc.seg: In an air strike of Israel a senior commander of Hamas has died.
It is the death of 2nd Hamas leader in Israel continual attack for a week in Gaza Strip.
The office bearer of Hamas has said that Abu Zakaria Al Jamal died on Saturday in the Al Shujahia street, located in the east of Gaza City.
In another air attack on Thursday,the scholar of Hamas Alam Nazar Rehan was also killed.
The Hamas expatriate leader living in Syria Khalid Mashal has shown his will to take revenge and warned Israel against ground attack.
Thousands of Israeli soldiers and tanks are located at Gaza Border and they are waiting for the orders to attack.
The Americans have appealed for the cease fire but they have said that the decision to attack Gaza or not will be taken by Israel.
President George Bush in his weekly address on radio has accused Hamas of increasing atrocities in order to aggravate the situation and termed it's Rocket Attacks on Israel as terrorism.
He has said that America is working for the cease fire but any one sided pact will not be acceptable.

doc.seg: The officials of Pakistani security forces has said that dead bodies three men have been recovered from the tribal area of North Waziristan
There is a doubt that Taliban has killed them by giving them death sentences.
The bodies central city of North Waziristan near Miran Shah and the are such letters in the United States for the men to spying has been accused of.

hl.seg: Israeli attacks on Gaza continue on the 10th day

doc.seg: A Palestinian child injured in the Israel missile attack. Israel ground army is fighting with the troops of Hammas in the entire area of Gaza strip where as Israeli aerial army continued attacks on the area's of militant groups on the 10th day.
The defense minister of Israel, Ehud Barack, said on Monday that they will continue the army operation until the people of Southern Israel are safe from the rocket attacks of Hammas.
Although, besides the attacks of Israel, the rocket firing is continued from the side of Hammas in which four people including three local citizens are killed.
Leader of Hammas, Mahmood Zuhr on monday insisted on his friends to demolish the Israeli Army and target local Israeli residents.
But one official of Hammas said that they plan to send a delegation to Egypt on Monday to think about the current violent situation of their party.

In Gaza one Palestinian woman injured. Medical sources in Gaza said that during the last 10 days almost 530 people have been killed and these also include those 11 civilians in which at least there were five children.
Israel, in a ground attack, has reported one soldier killed and 10 more injured.
Israel has stopped journalist, to do reporting on the military action, from entering Gaza.

hl.seg: Elected Vice President of America Joseph Biden reaches Pakistan

doc.seg: Foreign Minister received the elected Vice President of America
America's Vice President Joseph Biden has reached Islamabad on his visit to Pakistan on Friday with his delegation.
Foreign Minister Shah Mehmood Qureshi and high ups of American Embassy received them.
American Senator Lindsy Graham is also accompanying Biden.

Press Officer of American Embassy Lew Fenter told Voice of America, during his tour newly elected President will discuss several regional affairs with Pakistani Leadership, however he refused to disclose further details.
According to Foreign Office Joseph Biden will also meet Army Chief General Ashfaq Pervez Kiani along with high ups of government.
It is hoped that in these meetings beside important bilateral and International issues war against terrorism will also be discussed.
Joseph Biden has been awarded the Hilal e Pakistan
After reaching Islamabad Joseph Biden met President Asif Ali Zardari.
In meeting President awarded him the Hilal e Pakistan medal for playing his role in the establishment of closer ties between America and Pakistan.

It should be noted that Joseph Biden as the Chairman of Committee for foreign relations of American Senate with collaboration of Senator Richard Lugar introduced a bill which proposed a 3 times increase making it 5.7 billion dollars civilian aid for next five years to Pakistan.

hl.seg: Joe Biden played an important role in removing the previous president Parvez Musharaf, Prime Minister Gilani

doc.seg: Yusuf Raza Gilani and Joe Biden ( File Photo)

Prime Minister Yusuf Raza Gilani has stated that America's Vice President candidate Joe Biden has played an important role in making Parvez Musharaf leave as Army Chief of Staff. And Joe Biden has also helped a lot for democracy in Pakistan.
Yusuf Raza Gilani made this statement during a talk with the press in Shipyard, Karachi.
He said that Joe Biden is Pro-Pakistan or supports Pakistan. And he, as a chairperson of Foreign Affair Committee of American Senate, presented a bill of 15 billion dollars aid for Pakistan.

On protesting against missile attacks done by American investigating jets, Prime Minister Pakistan said that Pakistan has no agreement with American government on permitting such attacks and according to him, this is a matter of Pakistan's despotism therefore they can not permit attacks of these kind on any condition in the country's premises.
he also expressed a hope that after the succession of the new American government, change will come to the American policy as well.
(File Photo)

Yusuf Raza Gilani has said that the government has successfully separated taliban from ordinary tribesmen but the drone attacks have proven to be very harmful to the efforts of the government and the terrorists once again join hands with the local tribes.
he said that the international community agrees to this stance of Pakistan.
Prime Minister added that if reliable evidence is provided, then the Pakistani Forces will operate itself in its own territory.

prime minister yusuf Raza Gilani repeated his stance over Mumbai attacks and said that if India provides evidence, then investigation will be carried out on its basis and if there is any proof of someone's involvement, he will be dealt according to the laws of the country.
while answering a question about Rehman Malik's tour to Britain and his meeting with the MQM leader Altaf Hussain, the Prime Minister said that Rehman Malik went to London on his approval.

hl.seg: Quetta, four policemen including DSP killed.

doc.seg: File Photo
on an important highway of Quetta, Saryab road, firing by unknown people killed four policemen including DSP 'Deputy Superintendent of Police".

On Wednesday morning in a jeep two DSP, a Sub-inspector and two constable of police training center was going on saryab road, near degree College on a motorcycle rider unknown attackers jeep police opened fire, sub-Inspector Mehdi and constable, were killed on the spot while one DSP Hasan Ali died after reaching the hospital died of severe injuries.
Hospital sources say that the severe injuries DSP Ghulam Mahmud critical condition and they also head bullets in his neck and began.

hl.seg: The death of another Indian software engineer in America

doc.seg: Another software engineer belonging to Andhra Pradesh has been shot and killed by unknown attackers.
26 year old Akshay Vishal of Secunderanadwas shot two days ago by unidentified assailants in the state of Arkansas. Vishal died in the hospital while undergoing treatment two days later.
He was an employee of Satyam Computers and was providing services for Falcon Jet Airways in America.
In the last one year, seven students from Andhra Pradesh have been killed by American anti-social elements.

hl.seg: America must remain vigilant against enemy attacks: Bush

doc.seg: President George Bush insisted America to be vigilant against enemy attacks in his last weekly speech from radio.
Mr.Bush said the biggest threat for America is the possibility of any other terrorist attack. He warned that enemies of the state are waiting patiently and they are targeted to attack again.
Discharging President said that America must never be negligent of her defense.
President Bush conveyed best wishes for upcoming President Barack Obama, who will sworn in on Tuesday.
Newly elected President Barack Obama threw light from the platform of Democratic party on the historical importance of Oath ceremony in his speech on weekly radio.
He said that the ceremony is such a tradition in which the peaceful transfer of powers is deeply tied to American greatness.
Mr. Obama reminded that many people even can't imagine that their leaders will quit the authority without struggle or bloodshed.

doc.seg: Pakistani President Asif Ali zardari has apprecaited the presidential talk of Obama, and he said that he will support to the muslim world, and the pakistan will also support them to get the pakistan and America benefited.
In a statement on Wednesday he said that the revision of high values and respect by President of America is good for all the people in the world for a better future.

As per the statement the President Zardari has said that the responsibility lies on America to search new ways for peace, development and prosperity with the help of universal brothers in the twenty first century.

hl.seg: President Obama has appointed a special representative for Afghanistan and Pakistan.

doc.seg: Richard Holbrook, ex ambassador for UN Richard Holbrook has been appointed as special representative for Pakistan and Afghanistan.
Holbrook had played an important role in the signing of peace agreement of Bosnia Herzegovina.
Holbrook said that he is ready for the consultancy of President Obama for Afghanistan and Pakistan.
He added that it is not an easy job.
He said that the history of both the countries is different.
George Mitchell has been selected for Middle East, who will try to maintain conferences held between Arab and Israel.
Mitchell is the erstwhile Senator he played his role to bring peace in Northern Ireland.
Mitchell said today while speaking in State Department, that Middle East's current condition is very unstable, complicated and dangerous.
But still, America will not stay back in the struggle to bring peace over there.

hl.seg: Afghanistan: Voter registration is in peril.

doc.seg: Afghanistan's election commission has said that due to the sake of peace, it is delaying the voter registration process in a few southern areas.
Voter registration for upcoming Presidential Election in Southern Afghanistan started this week.
But commission has said that until the betterment of the situation of security, voters from a few areas of the state Helmand will not be able to get registered.
The rate of violence has been increased since last year in those southern areas where Taliban Rebellions have increased their attacks on Afghan Forces and International Forces.

In the meanwhile, Afghan Forces and International Forces have said that in the middle night of Wednesday and Thursday, during the fire exchange held in whole Afghanistan, they have killed at least 28 militants.

hl.seg: Tea: A good cure for breast cancer

doc.seg: According to a new research, drinking three cups of tea every day
the chances of breast cancer is reduced by more then one third in women less then 50 years old.
In a research conducted in MOFT center of Florida America, it has been told that women with less then 50 years age that have breast cancel onco
gets the chances of breast cancer reduced by 37 percent who drink tea three cups a day.
The research shows that the aged women dont get any effect from drinking three or more cups of tea a day.
The researchers think that the tea contains such elements that are effective against the special type of onco in the breast cancer (that effect the women younger then 50 years age)
in the Moft Cancer Center situated in Tampa city of the State of Florida, a research was carried out on 5 thousand women who had taken the treatment for breast cancer.
Their ages were between 20 and 70 years.
the experts compared their medical record and life pattern with that of women who were safe from breast cancer.
the experts also found out that on a particular type of cancer, Lobular, tea had shown a great effect and it reduced by 66 percent.
almost every tenth patient of breast cancer suffers from this type of it.
this type of cancer is more dangerous because it deep inside and is usually diagnosed when it has already spread to a great extent.
Experts say that by taking at least three cups a day regularly, the danger of breast cancer can be reduced in young women.
they say that making tea a regular drink in daily life can cause great resistance in the body against breast cancer.
in Britain, every year, almost 40 thousand women are diagnosed to have breast cancer.

hl.seg: The Afghan war is the greatest challenge faced by America : Gates.

doc.seg: American Defence Minister Robert Gates has said that the biggest Military challenge to America is the war in Afghanistan
Gates is today giving a briefing to American Senate and representatives of the Congress on the Obama Administrations policy on Afghanistan and Iraq wars.

Gates told the Armed Services Senate Committee that the war is not the only solution to Afghan problem but he further said that in order to make many areas secure, Army Personal are not available,taking the advantage of it the Taliban carry out actions.

hl.seg: Why reduction in exercise with increase in the age
New Research

doc.seg: Exercise is good for health in every age
This keeps the heart healthy,reduces the level of cholesterol,Helps in keeping the weight low, helps in reduction of sugar and reduces Alzheimer meaning decreases the speed of dementia.
Unfortunately, in many people with the increase in the age, the capability to carryout exercise also decreases.
The specialists say that with exercise our body and brain remain active but age can have effect on it.
The American Medical Association says that Many health problems can occur if exercise is not carried out.
Doctor Patrisha Pae Leka of the Meo Clinic in Mani Sotta says that the reason for the addition in the age is from inability of exercise and less functionality in the body.
Doctor Patrisha teaches medicine in the Meo Clinic.
She did the research on the heart illnesses in old age people and the the benefits of doing exercises.
A team of doctors used the high frequency layers of sound to test the functioning of the heart.
In which they studied the work of blood pump in the heart, its squeezes and the resting of the heart.
The experts had given full attention on the left side of the heart which is the important part where the blood is pumped.
They came to know that with the growing age the grievousness is added in the respiration work of the heart.
Doctor Patrisha says that with the growing age the grievousness is added in the respiration work of the heart and with the growing age the effect grows with the exercise.
Doctor Garven Ken was included in this study.
They say that we were surprised to see that this thing is effected necessarily and with this it has been clear that bad exercise functionality has an affect on the heart's respiration work.
some times blood pressure can cause disorders in heart's functions and heart diseases.
if the doctor and the patient work in tandem in this regard, then they can take advantage of the benefits of exercise even with the age.
a detailed report in this matter is published in a magazine of American Medical Association.

hl.seg: No chances of instant war with Pakistan: Indian Army Chief

doc.seg: Indian Army Chief General Deepak Kapoor says that no chances of instant war with Pakistan, however for the defense of country and to assure the security of her interests we are always vigilant.
General Kapoor blamed that despite of sureties and International pressure in result of Mumbai attacks, in his words, terrorism network is not only present in Pakistan but is also active.
He said this in Srinagar while talking to correspondents.
Indian Army Chief was on a day's tour of Kashmir for the analysis of preparations of armed forces on borders and of complete defense situation in New Delhi administered Kashmir.
He was asked that according to media reports Pakistan has refused the proves of Mumbai attacks presented by India, what is his opinion in this regard?
General Kapoor said that decisions of war or peace affairs are managed by political leadership.
Talking about the alleged terrorism network in Pakistan he said that Indian Army will have to face the forces which are objected to destroy peace and weaken India.
He said that 700 to 800 militants are present in Indian Kashmir almost half of them are foreigners.
General Deepak Kapoor said with the betterment of weather attempts of slander may increase from Pakistan and her side of Kashmir, however India has increased vigilance on borders.
He refused the chances of reducing the number of deployed army in Indian administered Kashmir by saying that no compromise on country security.

Most elders of our family belonged to labor class.
And when we in our childhood we used to see our uncles doing strenuous labor it gave birth to this desire in our heart that God protects us from strenuous physical labor.
To seek refuge from it we wrote a letter to the editor of daily Amroz and asked what should we do after matriculation exams that we dont have to go through strenuous physical labor.
Editor in his reply wrote that we should become a doctor or an engineer and should opt for such and such subjects to study.
From the beginning we were inclined toward engineering and also in metric we opted for technical drawing instead of biology.
But at the time of admission in FSC elder brother insisted on doing FSC in Pre Medical and become a doctor.
We hardly studied biology for a month and when we couldnt understand a thing we swapped biology for Mathematics.
It means that the fear of strenuous physical jobs made us to become engineers and now we are well placed among many the youth of our family and for this we are thankful to God
This we remembered when we were trying to lift carpet from our old house with our two young sons.
It was not even 30 minutes for us working that our younger son said Dad it feels like I am not born for this job.
We said if it is true then study hard like us and free yourself from physical labor.
Son started saying that I am studying and will complete my studies but I cant do this work .
Three of us somehow managed to finish the job and got back home.
What it means is that when a man decides the destination no matter what were the motives behind this no one can stop him from getting it.
But if you dont even know what you have to do then God be with you.
